data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Winding Road and Grassland Tileset
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to make smoother carriage wagon trail curves, with added terrain details and matching seasonal touches? For example:
Adding wagon wheel marks to trails to indicate frequent usage?
Adding a wet or muddy feel to the trails to portrait usage during bad weather?
Adding a sense of aridness to trails?

This pack is a collection of tile maps that can be used to extend and support added details to wagon trails to realize your worldbuilding needs!

Features:

* 3 seasons (rainy, normal, dry) of tilesets A1, A2 and C
* Common Outside B
* Sample map included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
